    • getEnchantment

      public static org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment getEnchantment(String name)
      Gets an enchantment by name from UberRecords.
      Parameters:
      name - - The enchantment name to get (can be a partial string like "sharp" gives "Sharpness")
      Returns:
      The enchantment or null
